author: odoo
code:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-


{
    'name': 'Products & Pricelists',
    'version': '1.2',
    'category': 'Sales',
    'depends': ['base', 'decimal_precision', 'mail'],
    'description': """
This is the base module for managing products and pricelists in Odoo.
========================================================================

Products support variants, different pricing methods, vendors information,
make to stock/order, different units of measure, packaging and properties.

Pricelists support:
-------------------
    * Multiple-level of discount (by product, category, quantities)
    * Compute price based on different criteria:
        * Other pricelist
        * Cost price
        * List price
        * Vendor price

Pricelists preferences by product and/or partners.

Print product labels with barcode.
    """,
    'data': [
        'data/product_data.xml',
        'security/product_security.xml',
        'security/ir.model.access.csv',
        'wizard/product_price_list_views.xml',
        'views/res_config_settings_views.xml',
        'views/product_attribute_views.xml',
        'views/product_uom_views.xml',
        'views/product_views.xml',
        'views/product_template_views.xml',
        'views/product_pricelist_views.xml',
        'views/res_partner_views.xml',
        'report/product_reports.xml',
        'report/product_pricelist_templates.xml',
        'report/product_product_templates.xml',
        'report/product_template_templates.xml',
    ],
    'demo': [
        'data/product_demo.xml',
        'data/product_image_demo.xml',
    ],
    'installable': True,
    'auto_install': False,
}
comments: this base module managing products pricelists odoo                                                                            products support variants  different pricing methods  vendors information  make stock order  different units measure  packaging properties   pricelists support                            multiple level discount (by product  category  quantities)       compute price based different criteria            other pricelist           cost price           list price           vendor price  pricelists preferences product partners   print product labels barcode                 coding  utf 8        part odoo  see license file full copyright licensing details
content:
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# Part of Odoo. See LICENSE file for full copyright and licensing details.

{
    'name': 'Products & Pricelists',
    'version': '1.2',
    'category': 'Sales',
    'depends': ['base', 'decimal_precision', 'mail'],
    'description': """
This is the base module for managing products and pricelists in Odoo.
========================================================================

Products support variants, different pricing methods, vendors information,
make to stock/order, different units of measure, packaging and properties.

Pricelists support:
-------------------
    * Multiple-level of discount (by product, category, quantities)
    * Compute price based on different criteria:
        * Other pricelist
        * Cost price
        * List price
        * Vendor price

Pricelists preferences by product and/or partners.

Print product labels with barcode.
    """,
    'data': [
        'data/product_data.xml',
        'security/product_security.xml',
        'security/ir.model.access.csv',
        'wizard/product_price_list_views.xml',
        'views/res_config_settings_views.xml',
        'views/product_attribute_views.xml',
        'views/product_uom_views.xml',
        'views/product_views.xml',
        'views/product_template_views.xml',
        'views/product_pricelist_views.xml',
        'views/res_partner_views.xml',
        'report/product_reports.xml',
        'report/product_pricelist_templates.xml',
        'report/product_product_templates.xml',
        'report/product_template_templates.xml',
    ],
    'demo': [
        'data/product_demo.xml',
        'data/product_image_demo.xml',
    ],
    'installable': True,
    'auto_install': False,
}
description: Odoo. Open Source Apps To Grow Your Business.
